SEARCH
Module ing.sw
Package IS24_LB11.gui.phases

Class LoginGUIState

java.lang.Object
IS24_LB11.gui.phases.ClientGUIState
IS24_LB11.gui.phases.LoginGUIState
All Implemented Interfaces:
PlayerStateInterface
public class LoginGUIState extends ClientGUIState implements PlayerStateInterface
The LoginGUIState class manages the login phase of the game in the GUI. It handles the initialization and execution of the login process, as well as communication with the server.

  • Constructor Summary

    Description

    Constructs a new LoginGUIState with a reference to the main ClientGUI.
